description:
More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy`s response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!
Ein Schwur zwischen Männern – Ruffy und Momonosuke Kozuki
Okoto no Chikai: Luffy to Kouzuki Momonosuke
Un serment d`hommes. Luffy et Kozuki Momonosuke
Мужская клятва! Луффи и Козуки Момоноске!
عهد بين رجلين! لوفي وكوزكي مومونوسكي!
男の誓い ルフィと光月モモの助
